title: Three-way merger nets $100M in VC cash to Galvanize pulsed electric fields for cancer, heart disease, bronchitis
author: Conor Hale
description: The life science venture capital firm Apple Tree Partners is bringing three of its portfolio companies together under a single banner—and its progeny has raised $100 million to support their newly | The life science venture capital firm Apple Tree Partners has brought three of its portfolio companies together under a single banner to pursue energy therapies for chronic bronchitis, cardiac arrhythmias and solid tumors.
